title: Soil Conservation District: Jerramungup
creator_credit: Gerry North and Western Australia. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: Describes how each committee member deals with a land degredation problem. Problems discussed and projects undertaken: wind erosion, tree and saltbush planting, direct drilling research, reduction of salinity and waterlogging in catchment area, growing of lucerne to reduce saline watertable.
